'(
wordrules

;;;;;;;; LEE ADDED RULES ;;;;;;;;;;;;

;; 4/16/2019
;; "infiltrate is unchanged" -> infiltrate=present
((ruleid unchanged-disease-or-finding-is-affirmed-rule)
 (concept ?0)
 (words ("<DISEASE-THING>" "<EXAM-FINDING-THING>"))
 (tests (and (notneg ?0) ("hasPropertyValue" ?0 "change" ":UNCHANGED:")))
 (properties (directionality affirmed))
 (removeproperties change))

;; 2/27/2019:  Convert existence probability into directionality
((ruleid finding-or-disease-with-possible-existence-is-possible-rule) 
  (concept ?0) 
  (words 
    ("<DISEASE-THING>" "<EXAM-FINDING-THING>"))
  (tests (and (notneg ?0) (hpvl ?0 "existence" (list ":PROBABILITY:" ":POSSIBILITY:"))))
  (properties (directionality possible)))
  
((ruleid finding-or-disease-with-affirmed-existence-is-affirmed-rule) 
  (concept ?0) 
  (words 
    ("<DISEASE-THING>" "<EXAM-FINDING-THING>"))
  (tests (and (notneg ?0) (hpv ?0 "existence" ":PRESENT:")))
  (properties (directionality affirmed)))
  
((ruleid finding-or-disease-with-improved-existence-is-improved-rule) 
  (concept ?0) 
  (words 
    ("<DISEASE-THING>" "<EXAM-FINDING-THING>"))
  (tests (and (notneg ?0) (hpv ?0 "change" ":IMPROVING:")))
  (properties (directionality improved)))
  
((ruleid finding-or-disease-with-resolved-existence-is-absent-rule) 
  (concept ?0) 
  (words 
    ("<DISEASE-THING>" "<EXAM-FINDING-THING>"))
  (tests (and (notneg ?0) (hpv ?0 "change" ":RESOLVED:")))
  (properties (directionality negated)))
  
((ruleid spatial-extent-finding-rule) 
  (concept ?1) 
  (words 
    ("<SPATIAL-EXTENT-PROPERTY>" ) 
    ("<DISEASE-THING>" "<EXAM-FINDING-THING>"))
  (relations (extent-of ?1 ?0)))
  
((ruleid quality-of-finding-rule) 
  (complex-concept) 
  (words 
    ("<QUALITY-PROPERTY>" "<DEGREE-PROPERTY>") 
    ("<EXAM-FINDING-THING>"))
  (relations (quality-of ?1 ?0)))
  
((ruleid there-is-finding-rule) 
  (concept ?1) 
  (ordered true)
  (words 
    ("there is" "there are" "i see") 
    ("<DISEASE-THING>" "<EXAM-FINDING-THING>")))
    
((ruleid this-is-finding-rule) 
  (concept ?2) 
  (words 
    ("this")
    (":IS:")
    ("<DISEASE-THING>" "<EXAM-FINDING-THING>")))
    
((ruleid this-may-be-finding-rule) 
  (concept ?2) 
  (words 
    ("this")
    (":MAY_BE:")
    ("<DISEASE-THING>" "<EXAM-FINDING-THING>"))
  (properties (directionality possible)))
    
((ruleid finding-is-seen-rule) 
  (concept ?0) 
  (words 
    ("<DISEASE-THING>" "<EXAM-FINDING-THING>")
    ("is seen" "are seen" "are visualized")))
  
((ruleid existence-finding-rule) 
  (concept ?0) 
  (words 
     ("<DISEASE-THING>" "<EXAM-FINDING-THING>")
     ("<EXISTENCE>" "<TEMPORAL-DURATION-PROPERTY>"))
  (properties (existence ?1)))
  
((ruleid existence-finding-rule-2) 
  (concept ?0) 
  (ordered true)
  (words 
     ("<DISEASE-THING>" "<EXAM-FINDING-THING>")
     (":IS:")
     ("<EXISTENCE>" "<TEMPORAL-DURATION-PROPERTY>"))
  (properties (existence ?2)))
    
((ruleid change-of-state-of-finding-rule) 
  (concept ?0) 
  (words 
     ("<DISEASE-THING>" "<EXAM-FINDING-THING>")
     ("<CHANGE-OF-STATE>"))
  (properties (change ?1)))
  
((ruleid change-of-state-of-finding-rule-2) 
  (concept ?0) 
  (ordered true)
  (words 
     ("<DISEASE-THING>" "<EXAM-FINDING-THING>")
     (":IS:")
     ("<CHANGE-OF-STATE>"))
  (properties (change ?2)))
  
((ruleid change-of-state-of-anatomic-location-rule) 
  (complex-concept) 
  (words 
     ("<PULMONARY-LOCATION>")
     ("<CHANGE-OF-STATE>"))
  (properties (change ?1)))
  
((ruleid anatomic-location-modifies-finding-rule-2) 
  (complex-concept) 
  (ordered true)
  (words 
    ("<ANATOMIC-LOCATION>" "<ANATOMIC-LOCATION-MODIFIER>" ;; "<PULMONARY-LOCATION>" 
    	"<CHEST-XRAY-FINDING-MODIFIER>" "<CHEST-XRAY-FINDING-PROPERTY>") 
    (":IS:")
    ("<DISEASE-THING>" "<CHEST-XRAY-FINDING-THING>" "<CHEST-XRAY-FINDING-TERM>" 
    	"<QUALITY-PROPERTY>")))
  
((ruleid anatomic-location-modifies-finding-rule-3) 
  (complex-concept) 
  (stype ?1)
  (words 
    ("<ANATOMIC-LOCATION-MODIFIER>" "<PULMONARY-LOCATION>" 
    	"<PULMONARY-LOCATION-MODIFIER-SIDE>")
    ("<DISEASE-THING>" "<EXAM-FINDING-THING>")))
    
;; 4/16/2019, e.g. "bilateral pneumonitis"
((ruleid anatomic-location-modifies-finding-rule-4) 
  (concept ?1) 
  (words 
    ("<PULMONARY-LOCATION-MODIFIER-SIDE>") 
    ("<DISEASE-THING>")))
    
((ruleid anatomic-location-modifies-finding-rule-5) 
  (complex-concept) 
 ;; (ordered true)
  (words 
    ("<ANATOMIC-LOCATION-MODIFIER>" "<PULMONARY-LOCATION>" 
    	"<CHEST-XRAY-FINDING-MODIFIER>" "<CHEST-XRAY-FINDING-PROPERTY>") 
    ("<DISEASE-THING>" "<CHEST-XRAY-FINDING-THING>" "<CHEST-XRAY-FINDING-TERM>" 
    	"<QUALITY-PROPERTY>")))
    	
;; 11/15/2018
((ruleidXXX finding-or-disease-on-right-or-left-rule) 
  (concept ?0) 
  (ordered true)
  (words 
    ("<DISEASE-THING>" "<CHEST-XRAY-FINDING-THING>" "<CHEST-XRAY-FINDING-TERM>")
    ("in" "at" "on")
    ("the")
    (":RIGHT:" ":LEFT:"))
  (properties (location-of ?0 ?3)))

((ruleid finding-consistent-with-disease-rule) 
  (concept ?2) 
  (ordered true)
  (words 
    ("<EXAM-FINDING-THING>" "<CHEST-XRAY-FINDING-THING>" "<CHEST-XRAY-FINDING-TERM>" 
    	":SYMPTOM:") 
    (":CONSISTENT-WITH:")
    ("<DISEASE-THING>" "<CHEST-XRAY-FINDING-THING>" "<CHEST-XRAY-FINDING-TERM>"))
  (properties (directionality possible)))
  
((ruleid disease-instead-of-disease-rule) 
  (concept ?0) 
  (ordered true)
  (words 
    ("<DISEASE-THING>" "<EXAM-FINDING-THING>" 
    	"<CHEST-XRAY-FINDING-THING>") 
    (":INSTEAD-OF:")
    ("<DISEASE-THING>" "<CHEST-XRAY-FINDING-THING>"))
    
    ;; (actions ("applyModifierProperties" ?rule ?1))
    
  (properties (negated-conjunct ?2)))
   		
    
((ruleid negated-finding-consistent-with-disease-rule) 
  (concept ?2) 
  (ordered true)
  (words 
    ("<EXAM-FINDING-THING>" "<CHEST-XRAY-FINDING-THING>" "<CHEST-XRAY-FINDING-TERM>" 	
    	":SYMPTOM:") 
    (":CONSISTENT-WITH:")
    ("<DISEASE-THING>" "<CHEST-XRAY-FINDING-THING>" "<CHEST-XRAY-FINDING-TERM>"))
  (properties (directionality negated))
  (tests (neg ?0)))

((ruleid anatomic-location-is-property-rule) 
  (complex-concept) 
  (ordered true)
  (words 
    ("<ANATOMIC-LOCATION>" "<PULMONARY-LOCATION-MODIFIER>") 
    ;; ("_IS_")
    ("<CHEST-XRAY-FINDING-THING>" "<CHEST-XRAY-FINDING-TERM>" 
    	"<CHEST-XRAY-FINDING-MODIFIER>" "<CHEST-XRAY-FINDING-PROPERTY>")))
    
((ruleid parenchymal-changes-rule) 
  (concept ":PARENCHYMAL-ABNORMALITY-NO:") 
  (words 
    (":PARENCHYMAL:") (":CHANGES:" ":ABNORMALITY:")))
    
((ruleid lung-area-parenchymal-changes-rule) 
  (concept ":LOCALIZED-PARENCHYMAL-ABNORMALITY-NS:") 
  (words 
    (":LUNG-AREA:") (":LOCALIZED-PARENCHYMAL-ABNORMALITY-NS:")))
    
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

((ruleid "abnormalaorta-0") 
  (concept ":ABNORMAL-AORTA:") 
  (words 
    (":LEFT-LUNG:") 
    (":ROUNDED:") 
    (":CALCIFICATION:")))

((ruleidXXX "abnormalaorta-1") 
  (concept ":ABNORMAL-AORTA:") 
  (words 
    (":AORTA:") 
    (":ATHEROSCLEROSIS:" "osteoarthritic" "osteoarthritis" "arthritic" "arthritis") 
    (":CALCIFICATION:")))

((ruleid "abnormalaorta-2") 
  (concept ":ABNORMAL-AORTA:") 
  (words 
    (":AORTA:" ":ABNORMAL-AORTA:") 
    (":TORTUOUS:" ":ATHEROSCLEROSIS:" ":CALCIFICATION:")))

((ruleid "abnormalaorta-3") 
  (concept ":ABNORMAL-AORTA:") 
  (words 
    (":DIAPHRAGM:" ":AORTA:") 
    (":CALCIFICATION:")))

((ruleid "abnormalaorta-7") 
  (concept ":ABNORMAL-AORTA:") 
  (words 
    (":ATHEROSCLEROSIS:") 
    (":CALCIFICATION:")))

((ruleid "abnormality-1") 
  (concept ":BONY-ABNORMALITY:") 
  (words 
    (":SKELETON-NOS:") 
    (":ABNORMALITY:" ":BONY-ABNORMALITY:")))
    
((ruleid atherosclerotic-bony-changes-rule)
 (concept ":BONY-ABNORMALITY:") 
  (words 
    (":ARTHRITIS:") 
    (":CHANGES:")))
;;;;;;;;;;

;; "abnormalities"?  There is a potentially complex concept named :ABNORMALITY:...

((ruleid "anyacutedisease-0") 
  (concept ":ANY-ACUTE-DISEASE:") 
  (words 
    (":ACUTE:") 
    (":INFECTION:")))

((ruleid "anyacutedisease-2") 
  (concept ":ANY-ACUTE-DISEASE:") 
  (words 
    (":INFECTION:")))

((ruleid "artifact-0") 
  (concept ":ARTIFACT:") 
  (words 
    (":LEFT-HEMIDIAPHRAGM:") 
    (":SILHOUETTE:")))
    
((ruleid "artifact-1") 
  (concept ":ARTIFACT:") 
  (words 
    (":RIGHT-LOWER-LOBE:") 
    (":ARTIFACT:")))

((ruleid "artifact-2") 
  (concept ":ARTIFACT:") 
  (words 
    (":OVERLAYING:") 
    (":SHADOW:")))

((ruleid "atelectasis-8") 
  (concept ?1) 
  (words 
    (":PRIOR:") 
    ("<DISEASE> <FINDING>"))
  (properties (temporality historical)))

((ruleid "located-atelectasis-rule") 
  (concept ":ATELECTASIS:") 
  (words 
    (":LUNG-AREA:") 
    (":ATELECTASIS:")))
    
((ruleid "located-modified-atelectasis-rule") 
  (concept ":ATELECTASIS:") 
  (words 
    ("<PULMONARY-LOCATION>") 
    (":FOCAL:" ":COMPRESSIVE:" ":LINEAR:" ":LOCALIZED:") 
    (":ATELECTASIS:")))
    
((ruleid "modified-atelectasis-rule") 
  (concept ":ATELECTASIS:") 
  (words 
    (":METASTATIC:") 
    (":ATELECTASIS:")))

((ruleid "atherosclerosis-0") 
  (concept ":ATHEROSCLEROSIS:") 
  (words 
    (":AORTA:") 
    (":ATHEROSCLEROSIS:") 
    (":DISEASE:")))

((ruleid "atypicalpneumonia-0") 
  (concept ":ATYPICAL-PNEUMONIA:") 
  (words 
    (":ATYPICAL:") 
    (":PNEUMONIA:")))

((ruleid "bilateralpleuraleffusion-0") 
  (concept ":BILATERAL-PLEURAL-EFFUSION:") 
  (words 
    (":BILATERAL-LUNG:") 
    (":INTERSTITIAL:") 
    (":EFFUSION:")))

((ruleid "bilateralpleuraleffusion-1") 
  (concept ":BILATERAL-PLEURAL-EFFUSION:") 
  (words 
    (":BILATERAL-LUNG:") 
    (":INTERSTITIAL:")))

((ruleid "bilateralupperlobes-0") 
  (concept ":BILATERAL-UPPER-LOBES:") 
  (words 
    (":PERIHILAR:") 
    (":LUNG:") 
    (":LOWER:")))

  (concept ":BLUNTING-OF-CP-ANGLE:") 
  (words 
    (":INTERPLEURAL-SPACE-NS:" ":PLEURA:" 
    ":RIGHT-INTERPLEURAL-SPACE:" ":COSTOPHRENIC-ANGLE:") 
    (":BLUNTING:")))

  (concept ":BLUNTING-OF-CP-ANGLE:") 
  (words 
    ("<DEGREE-PROPERTY>") 
    (":BLUNTING-OF-CP-ANGLE:" ":BLUNTING:")))

  (concept ":BLUNTING-OF-CP-ANGLE:") 
  (words 
    (":LUNG-AREA:") 
    (":BLUNTING:")))

  (concept ":BRONCHIAL-WALL-THICKENING:") 
  (words 
    (":BRONCHIAL-WALL:") 
    (":CUFFING:" ":THICKENING:")))

    (":DIFFUSE:") 
    (":BRONCHIECTASIS:")))

((ruleid "chest-wall-generalized-infiltrate-rule-0") 
  (concept ":GENERALIZED-INFILTRATE:") 
  (words 
    (":CHEST-WALL:" ":PULMONARY:") 
    (":INFILTRATE:")))
    
((ruleid "lung wall free of infiltrate rule") 
  (concept ":GENERALIZED-INFILTRATE:") 
  (words 
    (":LUNG-AREA:") 
    ("free of")
    (":INFILTRATE:"))
  (properties (directionality negated)))

  (concept ":CHF:") 
  (words

    (":CONGESTIVE:") 
    (":FAILURE:")))

  (words 
    (":BLOOD:" ":HEART:") 
    (":FAILURE:")))
    
((ruleid "heart-contours-0") 
  (concept ":HEART-SIZE:") 
  (words 
    (":HEART:" "cardiomediastinal" "cardiac") 
    (":SILHOUETTE:" "size" "shape")))

  (concept ":CHRONIC-OBSTRUCTIVE-PULMONARY-DISEASE:") 
  (words 
    (":OBSTRUCTIVE:") 
    (":DISEASE:")))

  (concept ":CHRONIC-OBSTRUCTIVE-PULMONARY-DISEASE:") 
  (words 
    ("copd" "chronic obstructive disease")))

    (":NORMAL:" ":STABLE:"))

  (concept ":FRACTURED-RIB:")

    (":HEALED:") 
    (":FRACTURE:")))

((ruleid "onyx-18821-0") 
  (concept ":GENERALIZED-INFILTRATE:") 
  (words 
    (":GENERAL-LUNG-AREA:" ":BILATERAL:") 
    (":INTERSTITIAL:") 
    (":PATCHY:" ":DIFFUSE:" ":NODE:" ":FLUFFY:" ":ILL-DEFINED:")
    (":ABNORMALITY:")))

((ruleid "generalizedinfiltrate-recursive-modifier-rule")
  (concept ":GENERALIZED-INFILTRATE-MODIFIERS:")
  (pattern
    (":PATCHY:" ":DIFFUSE:" ":NODE:" ":FLUFFY:" ":ILL-DEFINED:"
    	":GENERALIZED-INFILTRATE-MODIFIERS:")))
   
((ruleid "generalizedinfiltrate-with-modifiers-rule") 
  (concept ":GENERALIZED-INFILTRATE:") 
  (pattern 
	(":GENERAL-LUNG-AREA:" ":PULMONARY-VESSELS:" ":INTERPLEURAL-SPACE:" ":BILATERAL:")
    (":GENERALIZED-INFILTRATE-MODIFIERS:")
    (":INFILTRATE:" ":DENSITY:" "OPACITY:" ":ABNORMALITY:" ":LOCALIZED-INFILTRATE:" 
       		":GENERALIZED-INFILTRATE:")))

((ruleid "generalizedinfiltrate-without-modifiers-rule") 
  (concept ":GENERALIZED-INFILTRATE:") 
  (pattern 
	(":GENERAL-LUNG-AREA:" ":PULMONARY-VESSELS:" ":INTERPLEURAL-SPACE:" ":BILATERAL:")
    (":INFILTRATE:" ":DENSITY:" "OPACITY:" ":ABNORMALITY:" ":LOCALIZED-INFILTRATE:" 
       		":GENERALIZED-INFILTRATE:")))

((ruleid "generalizedinfiltrate-with-extra-modifiers-rule") 
  (concept ":GENERALIZED-INFILTRATE:") 
  (pattern 
	(":GENERALIZED-INFILTRATE-MODIFIERS:")
    (":GENERALIZED-INFILTRATE:")))

((ruleid "generalizedinfiltrate-17") 
  (concept ":LOCALIZED-INFILTRATE:") 
  (words 
    (":LOCAL-LUNG-AREA:" ":RIGHT:" ":LEFT:" ":SINGLE-LUNG:") 
    (":PATCHY:") 
    (":OPACITY:" ":INFILTRATE:" ":LOCALIZED-INFILTRATE:"))
  (properties (location ?0)))

((ruleid "generalizedinfiltrate-18") 
  (concept ":LOCALIZED-INFILTRATE:") 
  (words 
    (":LOCAL-LUNG-AREA:") 
    (":OPACITY:" ":INFILTRATE:" ":LOCALIZED-INFILTRATE:"))
  (properties (location ?0)))

((ruleid "generalizedinfiltrate-23") 
  (concept ":GENERALIZED-INFILTRATE:") 
  (words 
    (":GENERAL-LUNG-AREA:") 
    (":LINEAR:") 
    (":OPACITY:" ":INFILTRATE:" ":GENERALIZED-INFILTRATE:")))

    (":CLEAR:"))

  (properties (directionality negated)))

    (":INTERSTITIAL:")
    (":CHANGES:")))
